chunks.title: Ethereum Network Support
chunks.body: Ethereum Network: Most established blockchain platform, foundational to smart contracts, DeFi, and NFTs. Uses Proof of Stake consensus since The Merge. ~15-30 TPS mainnet speed. Variable gas fees $5-$50+ USD per transaction. Native token: ETH. NYLA supports transfers and swaps within Ethereum network only.
chunks.summary_en: Most established blockchain with smart contracts. PoS consensus, $5-50+ variable fees, 15-30 TPS.
chunks.summary_zh: 最成熟的智能合约区块链。PoS共识，5-50+美元可变费用，15-30 TPS。
